posts.title: Understanding Neural Network Weights Through Visualization
posts.excerpt: Struggling with understanding how weights work in neural networks? I've created a Streamlit app that visualizes neural network weights as layers of valves, helping you understand how weight adjustments affect the network's output.

images.caption: Interactive visualization of neural network weights
The architecture diagram of the neural network

posts.title: Optimizing LLM Training Pipelines
posts.excerpt: Insights into building efficient training pipelines for large language models and optimizing their performance for production environments.

images.caption: High-level overview of the training pipeline
Training performance metrics and optimization results
